heading: Sunday Night
text: Scattered snow showers north tapering off. Gradual clearing south. Colder. Lows 5 to 15 north to south.

heading: Monday
text: Early clouds and flurries north, giving way to partly sunny skies. Becoming mostly sunny south. Much colder. Highs in the low to mid teens north, 20 to 25 south.

heading: Monday Night
text: Fair skies through the evening, then increasing clouds. A chance of snow in NY late. Lows 5 to 15, closer to zero northeast.
